attributes.comment:
The proposed increase, in my opinion is a bit steep. Former residents of third
world countries who are here legally, work hard to get their families here to acquire
a better life, with this drastic increase in fees it will be very difficult for their
families to produce the US$ equivalent to complete their immigration process.
Keep in mind, if life was so wonderful in their countries they wouldn't be trying so
desperately to come here. In some countries this proposed fee is at least
$5500.00, if you want to increase the fee increase it by $100.00 but not the
whopping $580.00
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
